analysis.key_quote: Schedule F would remove due process for employees the government wants to get rid of (again solely for political purposes instead of for performance issues) and would strip employees of all protections, even if they’re involuntarily converted to schedule F.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed Schedule F rules, highlighting concerns about politicization and the removal of due process protections for federal employees, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and employee rights.
